headline: A Market Downturn Creates a Perfect Entry Point for This Promising AI Player
summary: When it comes to AI stocks, Nvidia is king.  Nearly every AI technology relies on heavy training and distributed computing power to function.  In areas like data centers -- crucial infrastructure that makes the AI revolution possible -- its market share is even higher.

raw.headline: A Market Downturn Creates a Perfect Entry Point for This Promising AI Player
raw.summary: When it comes to AI stocks, Nvidia is king.  Nearly every AI technology relies on heavy training and distributed computing power to function.  In areas like data centers -- crucial infrastructure that makes the AI revolution possible -- its market share is even higher.

headline: Here's the Next AI Stock I'm Buying
summary: Chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ: AMD), typically known by its initials AMD, has been beaten down over the past year or so, and is starting to look -- dare I say it -- cheap.  AMD is often overlooked because of its distant-second market share to Nvidia when it comes to GPUs (graphics processing units) for data centers and other AI applications.  First, while it's certainly true that AMD is a distant second in this market, the data center GPU space is big enough to have multiple winners.
